A DataConnector is an R6 class

DataConnector.Rd

A DataConnector is an R6 class to manage connection with remote data source.

Details

A DataConnector is an R6 class that carrying a shiny module that can return a cdisc_data object as a reactiveVal. DataConnector manages connection accompanied by three other classes. Classes relation illustrated on diagram.

Methods

  • DataConnector$new()

Method new()

Create a new DataConnector object

Usage

DataConnector$new()

Arguments

connection

(DataConnection) connection to data source

connectors

(list of DatasetConnector elements) list with dataset connectors

Returns

new DataConnector object

Method get_cdisc_data()

Function to get cdisc_data object interactively, useful for debugging

Usage

DataConnector$get_cdisc_data(
  refresh = FALSE,
  try = FALSE,
  con_args_fixed = NULL,
  con_args_dynamic = NULL,
  con_args_replacement = NULL,
  fun_args_fixed = NULL,
  fun_args_dynamic = NULL,
  fun_args_replacement = NULL
)

Arguments

refresh

(logical) should the data be downloaded? Defaults to FALSE, which returns last downloaded data.

try

(logical) whether perform function evaluation inside try clause

con_args_fixed

(NULL or named list) fixed argument to connection function

con_args_dynamic

(NULL or named list) dynamic argument to connection function (not shown in generated code)

con_args_replacement

(NULL or named list) replacement of dynamic argument of connection function

fun_args_fixed

(NULL or named list) fixed argument to pull function

fun_args_dynamic

(NULL or named list) dynamic argument to pull function (not shown in generated code)

fun_args_replacement

(NULL or named list) replacement of dynamic argument of pull function

Returns

cdisc_data object Get connection to data source

Method get_connection()

Usage

DataConnector$get_connection()

Returns

connector's connection Get connectors

Method get_connectors()

Usage

DataConnector$get_connectors()

Returns

list with all connectors

Method get_data()

Function to get data interactively, useful for debugging

Usage

DataConnector$get_data(
  refresh = FALSE,
  try = FALSE,
  con_args_fixed = NULL,
  con_args_dynamic = NULL,
  con_args_replacement = NULL,
  fun_args_fixed = NULL,
  fun_args_dynamic = NULL,
  fun_args_replacement = NULL
)

Arguments

refresh

(logical) should the data be downloaded? Defaults to FALSE, which returns last downloaded data.

try

(logical) whether perform function evaluation inside try clause

con_args_fixed

(NULL or named list) fixed argument to connection function

con_args_dynamic

(NULL or named list) dynamic argument to connection function (not shown in generated code)

con_args_replacement

(NULL or named list) replacement of dynamic argument of connection function

fun_args_fixed

(NULL or named list) fixed argument to pull function

fun_args_dynamic

(NULL or named list) dynamic argument to pull function (not shown in generated code)

fun_args_replacement

(NULL or named list) replacement of dynamic argument of pull function

Returns

List of datasets

Method set_server()

Set connector server function

Please also consider using set_server_helper method

Usage

DataConnector$set_server(server)

Arguments

server

(function) A shiny module server function that should return reactive value of type cdisc_data

Returns

nothing

Method set_server_helper()

Helper function to set connector server function

Usage

DataConnector$set_server_helper(
  submit_id = "submit",
  con_args_fixed = NULL,
  con_args_dynamic = NULL,
  con_args_replacement = NULL,
  fun_args_fixed = NULL,
  fun_args_dynamic = NULL,
  fun_args_replacement = NULL
)

Arguments

submit_id

(character) id of the submit button

con_args_fixed

(NULL or named list) fixed argument to connection function

con_args_dynamic

(NULL or named list) dynamic argument to connection function (not shown in generated code)

con_args_replacement

(NULL or named list) replacement of dynamic argument of connection function

fun_args_fixed

(NULL or named list) fixed argument to pull function

fun_args_dynamic

(NULL or named list) dynamic argument to pull function (not shown in generated code)

fun_args_replacement

(NULL or named list) replacement of dynamic argument of pull function

Returns

nothing Set data connection

Method clone()

The objects of this class are cloneable with this method.

Usage

Arguments

deep

Whether to make a deep clone.
